title: Between 1 October 2017 and 30 September 2018, will an armed group from Burundi engage in a campaign that systematically kills 1,000 or more civilians in Burundi?
preds: Based on general news and GJP consensus.

With "more than 1,200 people killed in politically-inspired violence since April 2015" and "over 400,000 Burundian refugees in neighboring countries", also a newly-reformed insurrectionist army and widespread central authoritarian aggression, there seems to be a possibility for the situation to ignite and one or more armed groups choosing a bloody campaign. https://reliefweb.int/report/burundi/burundi-populations-risk-serious-concern-15-september-2017
Based on general news and GJP consensus.
